text: Ingvar Kjellson (20 May 1923 – 18 December 2014) was a Swedish stage and movie actor.Ingvar Kjellson, biographic article in Nationalencyklopedin Kjellson was born in Kärna, Östergötland County. He was known for his roles in Hedda Gabler, The Wild Duck, The Beggars' Opera and Twelfth Night. Kjellson died at the age of 91 from pneumonia on 18 December 2014 in Stockholm, Sweden.Skådespelaren Ingvar Kjellson är död, obituary in Dagens Nyheter 20 December 2014 ==References== ==Other websites== * Ingvar Kjellson , at Dramaten Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Sweden Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish stage actors
title: Ingvar Kjellson
